name: GGPInc
0:
”Alexa, open G.G.P.”
”Alexa, ask G.G.P. for events at Cumberland Mall.”
”Alexa, ask G.G.P. for store openings at Ridgedale Center.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: g. g. p.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
GGP informs you of upcoming events and store openings at Cumberland Mall in Atlanta, GA; Ridgedale Center in Minnetonka, MN; and The Shops at La Cantera in San Antonio, TX. 
 
By enabling, this skill can be accessed on all your available Alexa devices.
 
To get started, enable GGP skill by saying, “Alexa, open GGP.”
 
Then say: 
 
“Alexa, ask GGP what new stores are opening at [mall name].”
“Alexa, ask GGP what events are coming up at [mall name].”

For more information, please visit 
https://www.ggp.com/leasing/business-resources/ggp-digital-support/alexa-skill.html
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
